content: *add a laid-back summer vibe to your kitchen decor with this crochet flip-flop dishcloth yarnspirations * --- *skill level * easy/intermediate --- **materials ** lily® sugar n cream® 70 9 g/2 5 oz 109 m/120 yds * main color mc hot blue 01742 *1 ball or 35 m/38 yds* * contrast a yellow 00010 *1 ball or 17 m/19 yds* *additional materials * stitch marker --- also available at lovecrafts 1 also see knit version 2 1 https //www lovecrochet com/us/flip-flop-dishcloth-in-lily-sugar-and-cream-the-original-solids 2 https //www yarnspirations com/lily-sugarn-cream-flip-flop-dishcloth/sck0512-007390m html
